content.value: This article presents an early look at how the LivePublication framework can enable live, updating components and generative content for computationally driven sciences. Presented is a language identification performance task, comparing the accuracy of two methods (langdetect and fastText).

description.value: A university in Christchurch, New Zealand
A test article constructed with the stencila python bindings
A government department in Wellington, New Zealand

funders.name: Ministry of Business, Innovation and Employment
